thread.title: Multi-function Photo Editor make a Good Photographer
thread.title_full: Multi-function Photo Editor make a Good Photographer

title: Multi-function Photo Editor make a Good Photographer
text: Multi-function Photo Editor make a Good Photographer , 21 September 2015 -- AllPepole Photo Editor is a powerful photo editor with many amazing effects and filters ! It is a very comprehensive photo editor and pretty much everything you could ever want to do on your phone! There are so many effects, stickers and features to apply to your photos! The Photo Editor software is a fun and powerful photo editor that lets you quickly be professional, even if you’ve never edited a photo before. Build in photo collage feature, Photo Editor will give you the look you want in seconds. Transform photos with the tap of a finger. It is used simply, yet powerful, photo editing tools to apply filters, adjust colors, and more! This photo editing tool packs a simple design with a powerful photo editor to give you everything you could, and make your photos to be amazing! It has the following key features:  Photo filters Gorgeous photo effects and frames Color balance Crop, rotate, and straighten your photo Adjust brightness, contrast, color temperature, and saturation Sharpen and blur Focus (Tilt Shift) Draw and add text Photo Editor is a better way to make collage as well. By following a few steps, you can use any layouts by remixing your own photos and sharing them with your friends: - Pick the layout you like best; - Choose photos from your gallery; - See them laid out in a cool collage; - Edit it to make it your own! Note: the edited image is saved in "Album/Picture" or "File Manager/DCIM/Camera" or “Gallery/Picture" More AllPepole product at APP Store:
